attributes.action: Rescind Bury Fc Expulsion from the EFL
attributes.additional_details: This is has been well documented across the media and the football community. If the decision could be rescinded it would help with employment of the players and provide moral within the community for its team
attributes.background: Bury FC had a deadline of the 27/08/19 to find a new owner or provide funds to run the club. Somebody did come forward but withdrew their offer. Then the EFL expelled Bury FC from the league. There is another offer to save the club if the decision is rescinded.
